message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can work out a better deal later if you'd like, but I'm feeling generous right now.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to be too generous. You can try to do better next time.
I'm still willing to be fair, but I need to make sure my share reflects the value of my time.  Let's split it 70/30. We can both make a good profit if we work together.
I'm not going to give in to your demands. You're not getting 70% of the pie. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't expect me to be generous.
